word.definition: someone who helps another person in their job
word.example: My assistant will get us some coffee.

word.definition: a person who is in charge of other people at work
word.example: He asked his boss for some time off.

word.definition: the person who is in charge of a company
word.example: Tom is the CEO of a large media company.

word.definition: someone that you work with
word.example: She went for a drink after work with her colleagues.

word.definition: a senior person who is in charge of part of a company
word.example: Jenny is our new Sales Director.

word.definition: a person who is paid to work for sb
word.example: The company has nearly 200 employees.

word.definition: using scientific knowledge to help design and build machines, equipment, roads, etc.
word.example: He works in electronic engineering.

word.definition: helpful and kind
word.example: My new colleagues are very friendly.

word.definition: a person who is in charge of an organization or a group of people
word.example: Maria is head of Human Resources.

word.definition: to tell a person’s name to sb who has not met the person before
word.example: Let me introduce our software developer, Pierre.

word.definition: travelling from one place to another
word.example: Did you have a good journey?

word.definition: a person who is in charge of a group of people at work
word.example: The marketing manager gave a presentation.

word.definition: the person who is in charge of a company
word.example: A new MD is taking over next month.

word.definition: a person whose job is to help sb with their work
word.example: She is the PA to the Finance Director.

word.definition: a person who deals with people visiting or telephoning an office building or a hotel
word.example: The receptionist asked me to wait in the lobby.

word.definition: a person whose job is to visit different businesses to sell a company’s products
word.example: A sales rep called to set up a meeting.

word.definition: a person in charge of a team of people at work
word.example: The team leader should always be willing to listen to ideas.

word.definition: a person whose job is to keep special equipment or machinery in good condition
word.example: Jacob is a technician in a pharmaceutical lab.

word.definition: scientific knowledge, which is used in practical ways
word.example: We use a lot of modern technology in our business.

word.definition: a place on the Internet where a company or person puts information
word.example: For more information and some great special offers, visit our website.
